title: applying patches issue
body: So I'm updating my client right I was at 78 and all of a sudden the percentage on the client just keeps on going down please tell me how to fix this.{{champion:114}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:1414}}

replies.body: That could have been some kinda weird connection thing where the client thought it had more of the patch downloaded than it really did, and later updated with the correct %. If you haven't been able to get that patch downloaded yet, try using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) for a quick **force repatch**.
